articles.title: Asian stocks sink on tech losses as rates, inflation fears mount By Investing.com - Investing.com
articles.description: Asian stocks sink on tech losses as rates, inflation fears mount
articles.content: Investing.com-- Most Asian stocks fell on Thursday amid persistent fears of sticky inflation inviting high interest rates, with the technology sector seeing the steepest declines as investors also lo… [+2737 chars]
